name: opal-client-4
description: ev.io client with a host of optimizations
author: opal

scripts.build: yarn run compile && yarn run packager
scripts.packager: yarn run compile && yarn electron-packager %INIT_CWD% OpalClient --overwrite --asar --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --prune=true --out=dist --icon=icon.ico
scripts.compile: yarn run format && yarn run bundle
